00001 #ifndef SASS_BACKTRACE_H
00002 #define SASS_BACKTRACE_H
00003 
00004 #include <sstream>
00005 
00006 #include "file.hpp"
00007 #include "position.hpp"
00008 
00009 namespace Sass {
00010 
00011   using namespace std;
00012 
00013   struct Backtrace {
00014 
00015     Backtrace*  parent;
00016     ParserState pstate;
00017     string      caller;
00018 
00019     Backtrace(Backtrace* prn, ParserState pstate, string c)
00020     : parent(prn),
00021       pstate(pstate),
00022       caller(c)
00023     { }
00024 
00025     string to_string(bool warning = false)
00026     {
00027       size_t i = -1;
00028       stringstream ss;
00029       string cwd(Sass::File::get_cwd());
00030       Backtrace* this_point = this;
00031 
00032       if (!warning) ss << endl << "Backtrace:";
00033       // the first tracepoint (which is parent-less) is an empty placeholder
00034       while (this_point->parent) {
00035 
00036         // make path relative to the current directory
00037         string rel_path(Sass::File::resolve_relative_path(this_point->pstate.path, cwd, cwd));
00038 
00039         if (warning) {
00040           ss << endl
00041              << "\t"
00042              << (++i == 0 ? "on" : "from")
00043              << " line "
00044              << this_point->pstate.line + 1
00045              << " of "
00046              << rel_path;
00047         } else {
00048           ss << endl
00049              << "\t"
00050              << rel_path
00051              << ":"
00052              << this_point->pstate.line + 1
00053              << this_point->parent->caller;
00054         }
00055 
00056         this_point = this_point->parent;
00057       }
00058 
00059       return ss.str();
00060     }
00061 
00062     size_t depth()
00063     {
00064       size_t d = 0;
00065       Backtrace* p = parent;
00066       while (p) {
00067         ++d;
00068         p = p->parent;
00069       }
00070       return d-1;
00071     }
00072 
00073   };
00074 
00075 }
00076 
00077 #endif
